title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, February 24, 2020
description: Today is the birthday of Judith Butler (1956), who argued that we “perform” our gender in her 1990 text “Gender Trouble,” now essential reading in gender studies classes.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Judith Butler (1956), who argued that we “perform” our gender in her 1990 text “Gender Trouble,” now essential reading in gender studies classes.
